name: Highway Core
description:
You are in the middle of a busy highway filled with trucks and cars. Shoot your way through an infinite horde of enemies with the various weapons that you can use! Can you set the highest score out of everyone else?

The enemy seems to have reinforcements! And you seem to be blocked by some kind of barrier! Defeat all the enemies inside to progress!

Running low on health and ammo? Eliminate your enemies to get more! But be careful! If not close enough those precious resources could be gone forever!

You're armed with 3 weapon types which are the AR, Shotgun, and the Sniper Rifle. Use these weapons to eliminate those that stand in your way!

Use your grappling hook, cybernetic legs, and jetpack to grapple, climb, run along walls, hover, and jump mid air. Be careful not to touch the road below, it hurts!

CONTROLS

Moving
WASD Jumping and Double Jump Spacebar Jetpack Hover HOLD Spacebar Grappling Hook Q Shooting Left Mouse Button Scoping Right Mouse Button Reloading  R Weapon Switching1,2,3Melee F
